content: ring christmas bells ring crosby and carol are the cutest couple this intermediate pattern is quick to work up featuring the pair of smiling silver bells tied with a big festive red bow they make the perfect project to hang around your home and inspire you to break out in song **materials** this pattern uses the following medium weight beginner yarn heijin sparkle yarn in silver red green or substitute with gray red and green easy peasy yarn easy peasy yarn in black pink 4 × 8mm safety eyes stuffing 4mm hook scissors darning/tapestry needle **terms & techniques** this pattern uses u s terms and is completed in the round unless otherwise noted rounds r magic_ring magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet increase increase invisible decrease decrease slip_stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch join slip_stitch join chain chain front loop only flo back loop only blo fasten_off invisible fasten_off whip stitch embroidery
